00020 /* include some QT libraries. */
00021 #include <QtGui>

00023 /* include headers defining the interface of the sources. */

00029 /* create the transaction payment wizard (as non-linear state machine). */
00030 PayWizard::PayWizard(const QString custName, const double charge, QWidget *parent) : QWizard(parent) {
00031     /* set the pages/states of the wizard/machine. */
00032     setPage(Page_SelectPayWay, new SelectPayWayPage (custName, charge));
00033     setPage(Page_InsertCash, new InsertCashPage);
00034     setPage(Page_InsertCard, new InsertCardPage);
00035     setPage(Page_Complete, new CompletePage);
00036 
00037     /* set the initial page/state. */
00038     setStartId(Page_SelectPayWay);
00039 
00040     /* set the title of the wizard. */
00041     setWindowTitle(wizardWinTitleStr);
00042 }
00043 
00044 /* handle and ignore the close event of the wizard. */
00045 void
00046 PayWizard::closeEvent(QCloseEvent *event) {
00047     event->ignore();
00048 }
00049 
00050 /* create the payment way selection wizard page. */
00051 SelectPayWayPage::SelectPayWayPage(const QString custName, const double charge, QWidget *parent) : QWizardPage(parent) {
00052     /* set the title of the page. */
00053     setTitle(payWayTitleStr);
00054 
00055     /* set the watermark of the page. */
00056     setPixmap(QWizard::WatermarkPixmap, QPixmap(":/graphics/paywizard/watermark"));
00057 
00058     /* set the top label of the page. */
00059     topLabel = new QLabel(payWayTopLabelStr);
00060 
00061     /* create the payment way radio buttons. */
00062     cashRadioButton = new QRadioButton(payWayCashLabelStr);
00063     cardRadioButton = new QRadioButton(payWayCardLabelStr);
00064 
00065     /* check the cash radio button. */
00066     cashRadioButton->setChecked(true);
00067 
00068     /* register fields containing customer name and payment charge. */
00069     registerField("customer.name", new QLineEdit(custName));
00070     registerField("payment.charge", new QLineEdit(QString("%1").arg(charge)));
00071 
00072     /* create the layout of the page. */
00073     QVBoxLayout *layout = new QVBoxLayout;
00074     layout->addWidget(topLabel);
00075     layout->addWidget(cashRadioButton);
00076     layout->addWidget(cardRadioButton);
00077 
00078     /* set the layout of the page. */
00079     setLayout(layout);
00080 }
00081 
00082 /* set the next page for the next button. */
00083 int
00084 SelectPayWayPage::nextId() const {
00085     if (cashRadioButton->isChecked()) {
00086         return PayWizard::Page_InsertCash;
00087     } else {
00088         return PayWizard::Page_InsertCard;
00089     }
00090 }
00091 
00092 /* create the cash insertion/manipulation wizard page. */
00093 InsertCashPage::InsertCashPage(QWidget *parent) : QWizardPage(parent) {
00094     /* set the title of the page. */
00095     setTitle(inputCashTitleStr);
00096 
00097     /* set the watermark of the page. */
00098     setPixmap(QWizard::WatermarkPixmap, QPixmap(":/graphics/paywizard/watermark"));
00099 
00100     /* create the top label of the page. */
00101     topLabel = new QLabel;
00102 
00103     /* payment money label, edit and buddy. */
00104     moneyLabel = new QLabel(inputCashLabelStr);
00105     moneyEdit = new QLineEdit;
00106     moneyLabel->setBuddy(moneyEdit);
00107 
00108     /* accept only numbers in the money edit. */
00109     moneyEdit->setValidator(new QRegExpValidator(QRegExp(numberRegExpStr), this));
00110 
00111     /* register a mandatory field for the money edit. */
00112     registerField("insertcash.money*", moneyEdit);
00113 
00114     /* create the layout of the page. */
00115     QHBoxLayout *layoutH = new QHBoxLayout;
00116     layoutH->addWidget(moneyLabel);
00117     layoutH->addWidget(moneyEdit);
00118     layoutH->addStretch();
00119     QVBoxLayout *layoutV = new QVBoxLayout;
00120     layoutV->addWidget(topLabel);
00121     layoutV->addLayout(layoutH);
00122 
00123     /* set the layout of the page. */
00124     setLayout(layoutV);
00125 }
00126 
00127 /* initialization code for the page. */
00128 void
00129 InsertCashPage::initializePage() {
00130     topLabel->setText(payChargeLabelStr + field("payment.charge").toString());
00131 }
00132 
00133 /* logic code for page validation. */
00134 bool
00135 InsertCashPage::validatePage() {
00136     /* check if the customer's money is less than the charge. */
00137     if(isLessThan(moneyEdit->text().toDouble(), field("payment.charge").toDouble())) {
00138         /* show a message. */
00139         QMessageBox::warning(this, infoMsgTitleStr, notManyMoneyStr);
00140 
00141         /* stay in the same page. */
00142         return false;
00143     }
00144 
00145     /* move to the next. */
00146     return true;
00147 }
00148 
00149 /* set the next page for the next button. */
00150 int
00151 InsertCashPage::nextId() const {
00152     return PayWizard::Page_Complete;
00153 }

00155 /* create the card insertion/manipulation wizard page. */
00156 InsertCardPage::InsertCardPage(QWidget *parent) : QWizardPage(parent) {
00157     /* set the title of the page. */
00158     setTitle(inputCardTitleStr);
00159 
00160     /* set the watermark of the page. */
00161     setPixmap(QWizard::WatermarkPixmap, QPixmap(":/graphics/paywizard/watermark"));
00162 
00163     /* create the top label of the page. */
00164     topLabel = new QLabel;
00165 
00166     /* card number label, edit and buddy. */
00167     cardLabel = new QLabel(inputCardLabelStr);
00168     cardEdit = new QLineEdit;
00169     cardLabel->setBuddy(cardEdit);
00170 
00171     /* set a mask for the credit card number. */
00172     cardEdit->setInputMask(creditCardNumberMaskStr);
00173 
00174     /* register a mandatory field for the card number. */
00175     registerField("insertcard.number*", cardEdit);
00176 
00177     /* create the layout of the page. */
00178     QHBoxLayout *layoutH = new QHBoxLayout;
00179     layoutH->addWidget(cardLabel);
00180     layoutH->addWidget(cardEdit);
00181     layoutH->addStretch();
00182     QVBoxLayout *layoutV = new QVBoxLayout;
00183     layoutV->addWidget(topLabel);
00184     layoutV->addLayout(layoutH);
00185 
00186     /* set the layout of the page. */
00187     setLayout(layoutV);
00188 }
00189 
00190 /* initialization code for the page. */
00191 void
00192 InsertCardPage::initializePage() {
00193     topLabel->setText(payChargeLabelStr + field("payment.charge").toString());
00194 }
00195 
00196 /* logic code for page validation. */
00197 bool
00198 InsertCardPage::validatePage() {
00199     /* check if the credit card has been charged. */
00200     if(chargeCreditCard(cardEdit->text(), field("payment.charge").toDouble())) {
00201         /* move to the next page. */
00202         return true;
00203     }
00204 
00205     /* show a message. */
00206     QMessageBox::warning(this, infoMsgTitleStr, cardNotChargedStr);
00207 
00208     /* stay in the same page. */
00209     return false;
00210 }
00211 
00212 /* set the next page for the next button. */
00213 int
00214 InsertCardPage::nextId() const {
00215     return PayWizard::Page_Complete;
00216 }

00218 /* create the payment completion/receipt wizard page. */
00219 CompletePage::CompletePage(QWidget *parent) : QWizardPage(parent) {
00220     /* set the title of the page. */
00221     setTitle(completeTitleStr);
00222 
00223     /* set the watermark of the page. */
00224     setPixmap(QWizard::WatermarkPixmap, QPixmap(":/graphics/paywizard/watermark"));
00225 
00226     /* create the top label of the page. */
00227     topLabel = new QLabel;
00228 
00229     /* create the layout of the page. */
00230     QVBoxLayout *layout = new QVBoxLayout;
00231     layout->addWidget(topLabel);
00232 
00233     /* set the layout of the page. */
00234     setLayout(layout);
00235 }
00236 
00237 /* initialization code for the page. */
00238 void
00239 CompletePage::initializePage() {
00240     /* the reply message of the payment. */
00241     QString message;
00242 
00243     /* if the wizard has visited the cash insertion page. */
00244     if (wizard()->hasVisitedPage(PayWizard::Page_InsertCash)) {
00245         /* calculate the change of the customer from the payment. */
00246         double change = field("insertcash.money").toDouble() - field("payment.charge").toDouble();
00247 
00248         /* inform the customer for his/her payment change. */
00249         message = custChangeLabelStr + QString("%1").arg(change);
00250 
00251         /* disable, hide the cancel, back buttons. */
00252         wizard()->setOption(QWizard::DisabledBackButtonOnLastPage, true);
00253         wizard()->setOption(QWizard::NoCancelButton, true);
00254     } else {
00255         /* inform the customer for the credit card charge. */
00256         message = cardChargedLabelStr;
00257 
00258         /* disable, hide the cancel, back buttons. */
00259         wizard()->setOption(QWizard::DisabledBackButtonOnLastPage, true);
00260         wizard()->setOption(QWizard::NoCancelButton, true);
00261     }
00262 
00263     /* set the appropriate value to the top label. */
00264     topLabel->setText(message);
00265 }
00266 
00267 /* set the next page for the next button. */
00268 int
00269 CompletePage::nextId() const {
00270     /* the end of the state machine. */
00271     return -1;
00272 }
00273 
00274 /* show/hide the print receipt button. */
00275 void
00276 CompletePage::setVisible(bool visible) {
00277     QWizardPage::setVisible(visible);
00278 
00279     /* show/hide the print button and connect/disconnect the signal/slot entry. */
00280     if (visible) {
00281         wizard()->setButtonText(QWizard::CustomButton1, printButtonStr);
00282         wizard()->setOption(QWizard::HaveCustomButton1, true);
00283         connect(wizard(), SIGNAL(customButtonClicked(const int)), this, SLOT(printButtonClicked()));
00284     } else {
00285         wizard()->setOption(QWizard::HaveCustomButton1, false);
00286         disconnect(wizard(), SIGNAL(customButtonClicked(int)), this, SLOT(printButtonClicked()));
00287     }
00288 }
00289 
00290 /* print a simple receipt for the payment transaction. */
00291 void
00292 CompletePage::printButtonClicked() {
00293     /* create a printer object. */
00294     QPrinter printer;
00295 
00296     /* create a print dialog and assign it with the printer. */
00297     QPrintDialog dialog(&printer, this);
00298 
00299     /* open the dialog and handle printing properties. */
00300     if (dialog.exec()) {
00301         /* create a html text document. */
00302         QTextDocument textDocument;
00303 
00304         /* create html for the text document. */
00305         QString html = payReceiptHtmlStr.arg(appName,
00306                                              appVersion,
00307                                              field("customer.name").toString(),
00308                                              QDateTime::currentDateTime().toString(dateTimeFormatStr),
00309                                              field("payment.charge").toString());
00310 
00311         /* print the document .*/
00312         textDocument.setHtml(html);
00313         textDocument.print(&printer);
00314     }
00315 }
